mapper.select: SELECT T.SID, T.SERVER_NAME, T.SERVER_IP, T.LOCAL_IP, T.SERVER_ACTIVE, T.USE_PROXY, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM server_info T , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R
SELECT T.SID, T.SERVER_NAME, T.SERVER_IP, T.LOCAL_IP, T.SERVER_ACTIVE, T.USE_PROXY FROM server_info T WHERE T.SID = #{SID}
